description:
Chihiro is an art teacher living in Sakurasou to keep an eye on its residents. She`s doing everything she can to find a partner. She`s also http://anidb.net/ch43395 [Mashiro]`s stepsister, but she pushes care of her off onto http://anidb.net/ch43396 [Sorata].
Source: ANN
name: Sengoku Chihiro
